Hybrid Profile:

Hybrid are a British electronic music group based in Swansea, comprising Mike Truman
and Chris Healings, with the addition of Charlotte James completing their 2010 lineup.
They are primarily known as a progressive breaks act, although they overlap considerably
with progressive house and trance. However, the band are now taking a more structured
approach to song writing, with the addition of Charlotte James contributing to the
writing process.

The duo are considered pioneers of the electronic genre, and have produced four studio
albums, all garnering critical acclaim. They are known for their cinematic approach to
their production, specifically with the use of orchestral sounds, which is particularly
notable on their debut album Wide Angle when they collaborated with the Russian Federal
Orchestra. Also over their seventeen-year career, they have produced over 100 remixes
for over 40 artists.
